variation.name: Creates a fail case when an accrual-based item in the US GAAP taxonomy is included in the sum of cash provided by (used in) financing activities
variation.description: Creates the following error: The concept DividendsCash with a value of -30,605 is an accrual-based item in the US GAAP taxonomy that is included in the sum of cash provided by (used in) financing activities in the cash flows of the extension taxonomy.

result.message:
The concept ${fact1.label} with a value of is an accrual-based item in the US GAAP taxonomy that is included in the sum of ${NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities.label} in the cash flows of the extension taxonomy.

Accrual-based concepts should not be included in the investing section of the cash flows statement of the extension taxonomy. Replace ${fact1.label} with an appropriate US GAAP taxonomy cash flows item, if available or, if not, consider extending a concept. 

The properties of this us-gaap:DividendsCash fact are:
Period: 2016-03-31 - 2016-03-31
Dimensions: StatementScenarioAxis = PredecessorMember
Unit: USD
Rule version: ${ruleVersion}

The concept ${fact1.label} with a value of is an accrual-based item in the US GAAP taxonomy that is included in the sum of ${NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities.label} in the cash flows of the extension taxonomy.

Accrual-based concepts should not be included in the investing section of the cash flows statement of the extension taxonomy. Replace ${fact1.label} with an appropriate US GAAP taxonomy cash flows item, if available or, if not, consider extending a concept. 

The properties of this us-gaap:DividendsCash fact are:
Period: 2016-12-31 - 2016-12-31
Dimensions: StatementScenarioAxis = SuccessorMember
Unit: USD
Rule version: ${ruleVersion}

The concept ${fact1.label} with a value of -30605 is an accrual-based item in the US GAAP taxonomy that is included in the sum of ${NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities.label} in the cash flows of the extension taxonomy.

Accrual-based concepts should not be included in the investing section of the cash flows statement of the extension taxonomy. Replace ${fact1.label} with an appropriate US GAAP taxonomy cash flows item, if available or, if not, consider extending a concept. 

The properties of this us-gaap:DividendsCash fact are:
Period: 2016-01-01 - 2016-01-01
Dimensions: StatementScenarioAxis = PredecessorMember
Unit: USD
Rule version: ${ruleVersion}

variation.name: Creates a fail case when an accrual-based item in the US GAAP taxonomy is included in the sum of cash provided by (used in) investing activities
variation.description: Creates the following error: The concept GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvestee with a value of -778,639 is an accrual-based item in the US GAAP taxonomy that is included in the sum of cash provided by (used in) investing activities in the cash flows of the extension taxonomy. Accrual-based concepts do not belong and should not be included in the investing section of the cash flows statement of the extension taxonomy.

result.message:
The concept ${fact1.label} with a value of -778639 is an accrual-based item in the US GAAP taxonomy that is included in the sum of ${NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities.label} in the cash flows of the extension taxonomy.

Accrual-based concepts should not be included in the investing section of the cash flows statement of the extension taxonomy. Replace ${fact1.label} with an appropriate US GAAP taxonomy cash flows item, if available or, if not, consider extending a concept. 

The properties of this us-gaap:GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquityMethodInvestee fact are:
Period: 2016-01-01 - 2016-01-01
Dimensions: none
Unit: USD
Rule version: ${ruleVersion}
